#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
map<ll, ll> mp;
map<ll, ll> :: iterator it;
ll t, d, mx, sum, id, s[100005], e[100005], num, k, m, i, j, _t;
int main() {
    scanf("%lld", &t);
    for(_t = 1; _t <= t; _t++) {
        scanf("%lld%lld", &k, &m);
        for(i = 0; i < k; i++) {
            scanf("%lld%lld", &s[i], &e[i]);
            s[i]--;
            e[i]--;
        }
        for(i = 0; i < m; i++) {
            scanf("%lld", &d);
            for(j = 0; j < d; j++) {
                scanf("%lld%lld", &id, &num);
                id--;
                mp[s[id]] += num;
                mp[e[id]+1] -= num;
            }
        }
        mx = 0;
        sum = 0;
        for(it = mp.begin(); it != mp.end(); it++) {
            sum += it->second;
            mx = max(mx, sum);
        }
        
        printf("Case %lld: %lld\n", _t, mx);
        mp.clear();
        
    }
    
    return 0;
}
